master.commit_message: configure.ac: bump version to 2.6.1 and add NEWS
Make tag normalization more conservative: normalize only the bit that looks like a language tag
Update HTML
configure.ac: bump version to 2.6.0 and add NEWS

Using "master" instead of "language-tag"

This allows the use of variants like en-GB_ize

Do not validate language tags

Dictionaries named with invalid tags (e.g. “fr-toutesvariantes”) are found
in the wild. Pass the problem on to consumers; Enchant should permit these
tags.

Fix some licensing nits

Update instructions for getting a copy of the LGPL to use a URL rather than
the FSF’s mailing address.

Fix some mentions of the GPL which should be of the LGPL.

lib.c: simplify post-processing of suggestions

Since there’s only one source now (the back-end provider), assume the
suggestions contain no duplicates, and don’t de-dup them.

Also, assume there are no empty suggestions (or if there are, that it’s for
a good reason).

Finally, filter the suggestions against the exclusions list in-place.
.dir-locals.el: 'gnu' is  a more accurate style than 'K&R'
lib.c: add debug to show what ordering files and dictionaries are found

Use GLib logging for debug output

And document that we do this, so users can get debug output if they want.

(Also document ENCHANT_CONFIG_DIR in enchant(5).)

lib.c: inline the trivial function enchant_free_string_list

Naming it is not really useful, as the name of its callee, g_strfreev, is
almost as descriptive.
lib.c: allow some whitespace reformatting, since it’s fairly minor

configure.ac: call AC_CHECK_HEADERS with literal values only

Fix an autoconf warning.
Update gnulib

lib.c: remove two struct names that are never used

The struct definitions are in typedefs, and only the typedef name is used.

Move editor configuration to .editorconfig as far as possible

Put the .editorconfig file in src/ because the style really only applied to
files under src, not to the test suite.
Add copyright notices to build system and man pages
enchant-lsmod.c: bump my copyright year
src/Makefile.am: enchant.1 does not need to be processed by edit script

Fix some NULL pointer dereferences (thanks, GCC!)

Also add _GL_ATTRIBUTE_MALLOC to some functions.
